name: Adobe Edge Animate Template File
summary: Learn about .ANTMPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: With your .AN project file open, select File → Save As Template..., name your file, select the save location, and click Save.
There are two ways to use an ANTMPL file already created:
When opening the Edge Animate application, select the "Create from Template" option, select one of your templates or click Import to import a template, click Open.
Another way is to select "Create New" when opening the application, select File → Create From Template..., select one of your templates or click Import to import a template, click Open.
NOTE: As of November 2015, Edge Animate is no longer being actively developed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
